body.name: ECOWELL Air Purifiers for Bedroom, H13 HEPA Air Purifiers for Home Office Living Room, Air Filter Air Cleaner for Pet Dander Odors Smoke Pollen Dust, Small Air Purifier with 28dB Sleep Mode, EAP050
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 17 hrs 31 mins
features: 3-Stage Filter Purification Efficiency: Ecowell home air purifiers are equipped with a True H13 HEPA filter, which effectively removes 99.9% of particles as small as 0.3 microns, such as odor, dust, smoke, pollen, hair, and more. Experience cleaner and fresher air in your home or office with Ecowell.

High Circulation Rate: With its high-efficiency filtration technology, Ecowell portable air cleaner ensures that pollutants have nowhere to hide. It refreshes the air in rooms up to 215 ft² / 20 m² every half hour, providing you with clean and fresh air. The high CADR (Clean Air Delivery Rate) index guarantees fresh air in just 10 minutes. Air purifiers small and portable design allows for easy placement in various spaces, including large rooms, bedrooms, living rooms, offices, nurseries, kitchens, and basements.

Modern & Stylish Design: ECOWELL H13 air purifiers for home large rooms boast a modern and stylish design, featuring high-quality white ABS material and high-end fabric cloth. The raised white touch buttons are seamlessly embedded in the personal air purifier, enhancing both functionality and aesthetics. These air purifiers are perfect for pet owners, babies, children, the elderly, or anyone seeking to improve the air quality in their surroundings.

Ultra-Quiet Operation: ECOWELL smart air purifiers for bedrooms are equipped with a new brushless motor and offer 5 fan modes. When set to sleep mode, these compact air purifiers operate at a near-silent noise level of lower than 28dB, making them ideal for light sleepers. The advanced air filters efficiently clean your indoor air, creating a peaceful and relaxing environment for you to enjoy.

Filter Life Display: The large room air purifiers is equipped with a vibrant LED display that shows the wind speed, timing, and modes. Air cleaner features a real-time life bar that indicates the remaining life of the H13 HEPA filter. If the life bar starts flashing, it's a clear indication that it's time to replace the HEPA filters. Additionally, the room air purifiers come with 1-12 hour timers, allowing you to set the desired time based on your needs, even when you're away from home.

Ozone Free & Full Certified: ECOWELL pet air purifiers prioritize your safety by avoiding the use of negative ions that can generate harmful ozone and secondary pollution. They comply with CARB requirements for indoor cleaning devices and are certified by FCC, EPA, and ETL.Our filters are available for purchase on Amazon. Simply search for B0CPPLDFTG using the search bar on Amazon, and you will be able to find our compatible filters.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5 Fan Speeds Adjustable Sleep --> 1 --> 2 --> 3 --> 4, total 5 speeds settings, can be selected according to the real-time air quality to meet your different needs. 1-12 Hours Timer Function Press the timer button to turn on/off the timer, and continue to press the +/- button to set your time, which can be set for 1 to 12 hours to meet your need. Filter Replacement Reminder The 9 lights of the filter life bar will turn off gradually from right to left according to the service condition of the filter, and you need to replace the HEPA filter if all the lights start to flash.
Air Purifiers HEPA Filter H13 Hepa Filter ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and works great.. Highly recommend..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works as expected
reviews.reviewText: I like that it’s compact; and so far it’s working fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works Very Well!
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier is ideal for my studio apartment and accomplishes what it claims. It's really quiet on speed 1 and 2, a little more sound on 3 like a normal fan. It does not keep me awake at night, and I find the blue indicator lights to be soothing. I was sneezing and blowing my nose a LOT due to pollen, etc, until I began using it, and now my apartment air must be much cleaner because I'm rarely doing either!... even when I open a window for fresh air for a time.I pretty much run it all the time when I'm home, as the affects are so noticeably positive.The only sort of cons I found were that the control buttons are super sensitive. Initially I was pressing them harder than was necessary and they weren't working consistently. It was by accident that I discovered I should barely touch them. The buttons are made of less quality material than the rest of the unit, but it doesn't really take anything away from the unit's appearance. And the other thing is that the buttons are completely white, with no type of contrast, so until you know without looking which is which, they can be hard to differentiate.The unit is a good size and has a clean, modern look so it is a nice accent to the decor. A nice looking unit that is totally functional! Bravo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my bunnies room. Took the barn smell right out👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Difficult finding replacement parts
reviews.reviewText: The product functions work as advertised. Finding a replacement filter is another story. Tried contacting company to no response!Very frustrating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Finding the filters is impossible
reviews.reviewText: I really like this purifier but would not recommend it solely on the fact that I couldn’t find filter refills anywhere. If I would have known I would have chosen a different one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have some allergy issues and bought this air purifier to improve the air quality in my room. This purifier is very quiet and works as expected. So far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product is great!!
reviews.reviewText: It delivers everything it says!! I have used it in a room that had a musty smell and now I breath better and don't smell it!! I love this product and plan on buying 2 more!!
